name: Paperload - Deep Bass Edition
description:
Welcome to Paperload: Deep Bass Edition!

Find out what mystical power source is hidden deep beneath the ground and remember; people have been talking about weird sounds coming from underground… They are not talking about the good kind.

Dig deeper and deeper but do not forget to refuel and upgrade your digger or buy some mining drones from the mining center (left most building).

Can you figure out what inspired this game?

Hint: Help the company to expand their mining operations by buying more mining drones. Maybe they’ll find something interesting…

Thanks for playing! We hope you enjoyed the experience, please leave a rating if you have the time! TUTORIAL:
  • Gather money by mining resources.
  • Use money to upgrade your digger and buy AI diggers to proceed the game story.
Controls:

WASD for movement.

SPACE for interacting.

Mouse scroll for zooming in and out.

Extra notes:
  • All textures are hand-drawn with pen on paper
  • The game has an ending.
  • Made by five people, only one of whom has ever done a jam before. Been great fun!
Changes since release:

The version above is our patched release v1.1 that fixes some bugs present in the original. You can find the original version of our game below hosted on our github:

Paperload_WebGL_Release
